title: African scientists say Western aid to fight pandemic is backfiring. Here's their plan
description: Monkeypox is the latest case of how global health inequities persist. Vaccines went to the rich world while Africa lacks access. African scientists call for a bold plan to protect against pathogens.
content:encoded:
Monkeypox is the latest case of how global health inequities persist. Vaccines went to the rich world while Africa lacks access. African scientists call for a bold plan to protect against pathogens.

(Image credit: Tommy Trenchard for NPR)
dc:creator: Simar Bajaj
